title: League of Legends stopping sound and video from playing?
body:
Whenever I open LoL just this past week I've noticed while its open it seems like it disables my sound card and wont let me watch videos or play any music. I tried restarting my computer so all I ask is that you don't ask me to do so. Its something similar when I use FL Studio and switch to the ASIO sound driver and until I close FL or switch the sound driver it uses the issue persists. I just don't see how anything similar to this can be happening to me in LoL. Thanks in advance for your help!
-Lemoore

replies.body:
You may have a third party programme in the background that is trying to manage your audio and causing your issues. Try a clean boot with the instructions here:

- http://www.thewindowsclub.com/what-is-clean-boot-state-in-windows

Keep in mind that if you have a really unique audio setup (dual audio cards bridged) that League may not play well with them. Lemme know what happens! Good luck

Definitely sounds a bit strange.  Can you provide a little more detail on what you mean by "won't let me watch videos or play any music"? Do you mean that videos just won't start playing or that they play correctly, but no sound comes out?  Also, do you have sound within League of Legends normally and it's only external sounds are not available?
